name: Meeple Jump - No Time to Dice
name_original: Meeple Jump - No Time to Dice
description:
Meeple Jump - No Time to Dice

In this arcade style game, your task is helping the lovable Meeple to cross an array of dice by rotating them to Meeple’s favor. Pressing the arrow keys turns all the dice in the direction you want. This costs a point per turn, but you’re able to increase your score by landing on higher numbers. But watch out! Every dice has a side with deadly spikes and some may even have arrows on them to send you into the abyss, if you are not careful. Will you be able to keep going while the game keeps getting faster to earn glorious medals?

The Quit button may or may not crash the game.

Controls

WASD/ ArrowsTurn all dice at onceEscapePauseLeft ClickNavigate menus
